title: D-Link DI-707P Cable/DSL Router, 7-Port Switch, Print Server
features: Seven-port broadband router with print server
description: The DI-707P wireless router is a cost effective solution for building a wireless network for a small office. The DI-707P has a built-in 7-port switch along with a parallel port to share a printer on a small office workgroup or network. The wireless router has MAC filtering to allow or deny computers on the network access to the Internet, giving you the management control you need. The Network Address Translation allows you to share a single IP address and protects you from outside intruders gaining access to your private network. The DI-707P includes an easy-to-use web-based graphical user interface making router configuration easier than ever.
